channel.title: react on Anthony Dellavecchia
channel.description: Recent content in react on Anthony Dellavecchia

item.title: Web5 Self Service Identity
item.description: What is a Decentralized Identity? When you log into Facebook, you have to create an account and identity with them. When you log into Instagram, you have to do the same thing. When you log into TikTok, you do it again. For every website you use, you create an identity and that is stored and controlled by that corporation. What if you could create 1 identity and share it across all platforms?

item.title: Dev Rel Showcase
item.description: I always enjoy learning new technologies and creating projects. This website (linked here) was created in just a few days as a way to showcase my ability to quickly learn new skills, as well as showcase my technical content creation. Here were my goals: Create a website with React and Next.js Write a Blog post (for beginners) to help others understand APIs Create interactive animations and supplement them with my blog post Curate a list of my favorite blog posts Create a Dev Rel roadmap to plan my future goals Document my thought process and design My favorite features are:
